Articles.Content:
At this moment, rovers are kinda useless for science, unless you land a rover on the edge of two biomes, so you can drive to another biome in managleable time.

My idea is to implement following experiment: Drive a rover for X meters to complete the experiment and collect science points. Experiment would yield diminishing returns, so driving another X meters in the same biome would return less points, down untill 0.
